item.title: Dollar trade finance dips as demand for local currencies rises: JPMorgan's Zhang | Mint - Mint
item.description:
Dollar Trade Finance Dips as Demand for Local Currencies Rises: JPMorgan's Zhang

Publication Date: Not specified | Source: Mint

There has been a mild decline in the use of US dollars for trade finance in the Asia Pacific region, with demand for local currency financing increasing to fill the gap, according to a senior banker at JPMorgan.

  • Currency trends show a decrease in US dollar usage in trade finance.
  • Local currency financing is on the rise to bridge the gap.

Currency trends have been very interesting over the last few years, specifically in trade finance, where the bank has observed a mild decrease in US dollar usage, Charley Zhang, head of trade and working capital, APAC at JPMorgan, said in a virtual interview.

This shift in currency usage may have implications for the region's trade dynamics and financial stability.

item.title: Drug firms amp up hiring for top roles as growth beckons | Mint - Mint
item.description:
Drug firms amp up hiring for top roles as growth beckons

Publication Date: 2024 | Source: Mint

India's pharmaceutical companies are significantly increasing their hiring at the executive level to support growth amid favorable geopolitical forces.

  • Drugmakers are focusing on hiring key executives such as chief technology officers (CTOs), chief financial officers (CFOs), and chief human resources officers (CHROs).
  • There is an emphasis on hiring leadership for both emerging and regulated markets.
“The industry is finding it necessary to bolster its leadership team to navigate the expansion,” said an industry executive.

This trend reflects confidence in the pharmaceutical sector's future, with companies positioning themselves to leverage new opportunities.

item.title: Poco unveils teasers for X7 5G series ahead of Jan 9 launch in India: What all to expect | Mint - Mint
item.description:
Poco unveils teasers for X7 5G series ahead of Jan 9 launch in India: What all to expect

Publication Date: Not Available | Source: Live Mint

Poco is set to launch its latest X7 5G series in India on January 9, with two variants on offer: the Poco X7 5G and the Poco X7 Pro 5G. The new smartphones will be sold exclusively on Flipkart, showcasing exciting designs and features through social media teasers.

  • The Poco X7 5G features a centrally-placed squircle camera module, while the X7 Pro 5G has a pill-shaped camera island.
  • Expected color schemes include Poco's signature black and yellow, and dual-tone options for the Pro model.
  • Camera capabilities highlight a 50MP main sensor for both variants, with the Pro utilizing a Sony IMX882 sensor and a 20MP front camera for selfies.
  • The X7 Pro 5G will be powered by the MediaTek Dimensity 8400-Ultra chipset while the X7 5G is likely to use the Dimensity 7300-Ultra SoC.
  • Battery capacities include 6,000mAh with 90W fast charging for the Pro model and 5,110mAh with 45W charging for the base model.
  • The displays feature a 6.67-inch AMOLED 1.5K display with a 120Hz refresh rate and Gorilla Glass protection.

item.title: PlayStation Plus Monthly Games for Jan 2025: Suicide Squad: Kill the Justice League, Need for Speed Hot Pursuit Remastered, The Stanley Parable: Ultra Deluxe - blog.playstation.com
item.description:
PlayStation Plus Monthly Games for Jan 2025: Suicide Squad: Kill the Justice League, Need for Speed Hot Pursuit Remastered, The Stanley Parable: Ultra Deluxe

Date: January 5, 2025 | Source: PlayStation Blog

Happy New Year! Kick off your 2025 gaming sessions by taking on (and taking out) a league of corrupted super heroes, race on both sides of the law and escape office life with the PlayStation Plus Monthly Games for January. Suicide Squad: Kill the Justice League, Need for Speed Hot Pursuit, and The Stanley Parable: Ultra Deluxe launch January 7 for PlayStation Plus members.

  • Suicide Squad: Kill the Justice League - An action-adventure shooter where players tackle both single-player and multiplayer challenges against the Justice League in an open-world Metropolis.
  • Need for Speed Hot Pursuit Remastered - Experience high-speed police chases in a visually enhanced, competitive racing game featuring cross-platform multiplayer.
  • The Stanley Parable: Ultra Deluxe - An expanded version of the award-winning indie game with new choices and accessibility features.
All three games will be available to PlayStation Plus members on January 7 until February 3.

Make sure to download December’s games before they’re gone!

item.description:
Apple TV+ is available for free this weekend: Here's how to watch

“This is a great opportunity for viewers to experience all that Apple TV+ has to offer.”

item.description:
More Images of the OnePlus 13R Leak Ahead of Launch

Posted Jan 1, 2025 at 3:03 PM UTC

Recent leaks reveal additional images of the OnePlus 13R, showcasing its design ahead of its official launch set for January 7th.

  • The OnePlus 13R is confirmed to feature a Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 processor.

item.title: Just a fraction of the hydrogen hidden beneath Earth's surface could power Earth for 200 years, scientists find [clone] - Space.com
item.description:
NASA's SWOT Satellite Maps Ocean Floors in Unprecedented Detail

Publication Date: December 12, 2023 | Source: Live Science

A new satellite mission by NASA and France’s Centre National D’Etudes Spatiales has revealed intricate details of Earth's ocean floors, providing insights into underwater features that were previously unknown.

  • SWOT satellite provides a resolution of 5 miles (8 kilometers), delivering clearer data than 30 years of prior research.
  • Research focused on features like abyssal hills, small seamounts, and continental margins.
  • Discovery of numerous abyssal hills was a surprise to researchers.
  • SWOT data revealed thousands of previously unidentified smaller seamounts.
  • Future missions will continue to map ocean currents and assess global freshwater availability.
“Finding these features will really push scientific developments forward, including tectonic theories.” - Yao Yu

In conclusion, the SWOT mission allows for unprecedented exploration of oceanic features, greatly enhancing our understanding of ocean dynamics and ecology.

item.title: OnePlus 13 & OnePlus 13R All Set For India Launch: From Price To Specifications, Here's All You Need To Know - ABP Live
item.description:
OnePlus 13 & OnePlus 13R All Set For India Launch: From Price To Specifications, Here's All You Need To Know

Publication Date: October 2023 Source: ABP Live

The OnePlus 13 series, featuring flagship models OnePlus 13 and OnePlus 13R, is gearing up for its debut in India, with strong expectations based on its design and performance features.

Price In India (Expected)

  • OnePlus 13 starting price around Rs 67,000.
  • OnePlus 13R expected to be priced at approximately Rs 40,000.

What To Expect

  • Both models feature significant design changes, including a flat display.
  • OnePlus 13 equipped with Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset.
  • Camera capabilities tuned by Hasselblad and running OxygenOS 15.
  • Potential for a 6000mAh silicone-carbon battery with rapid charging capabilities.
"The OnePlus 13 could emerge as a strong contender in 2025, especially if its camera performance meets expectations."

In conclusion, the OnePlus 13 series promises to deliver notable advancements in design and technology, positioning it as a competitive force in the Indian smartphone market.

item.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 plus powered by Snapdragon 8 Elite spotted on Geekbench, To launch in January 2025 - Kalinga TV
item.description:
Samsung Galaxy S25 Series: Snapdragon 8 Elite Confirmed, Launch in January 2025

Publication Date: November 2024, Source: Kalinga TV

The upcoming Samsung Galaxy S25 series, set to launch in January 2025, has had multiple leaks hinting at the device's specifications. The latest leak confirms that the series will be powered by the Snapdragon 8 Elite SoC, with one device from the series appearing on Geekbench.

  • The Samsung Galaxy S25 Plus (SM-S931B) was spotted on Geekbench with 12GB of RAM and Android 15, scoring 2986 in single-core tests and 9355 in multi-core tests.
  • Leaks suggest that the Samsung Galaxy S25 Ultra will have a similar camera setup to the Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra, including a 200MP primary camera and 5x and 3x telephoto lenses.
According to a leak by tipster Assemble Debug (@AssembleDebug) on X, the camera setup on the Samsung Galaxy S25 Ultra is quite similar to the Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra.

The Samsung Galaxy S25 Ultra is expected to launch in the last part of January 2025, with high expectations for the device.

item.title: Meet Anmol, the bull whose one climax is worth ₹50,000 | Today News - Mint
item.description:
Anmol, the Champion Bull Unveils His Worth After Recovery

Date: Unavailable, Source: Today News

Anmol, an eight-year-old bull weighing 1.5 tonnes and standing 5 feet 8 inches tall, has become the talk of the town after winning multiple awards in animal shows across states. However, his recent liver infection due to indulging in groundnuts has led to a weight loss of about 200 kg, and he's now recovering under veterinary supervision.

  1. Anmol's award-winning journey in Pushkar, Rajasthan, and Meerut, Uttar Pradesh.
  2. His liver infection and subsequent recovery.
  3. The significance of Anmol's health and performance to the farming community.
"Minus the tail, he is about 10 feet long." - Article

While Anmol's health remains our priority, his story serves as an inspiration to the farming community, showcasing the value and recognition of champion bulls in the agricultural industry.

item.title: CES 2025: LG unveils new Gram series AI PCs - Deccan Herald
item.description:
LG Unveils New Gram Series AI PCs at CES 2025

Published: 01 January 2025, 12:28 IST - Source: Deccan Herald

LG has announced its new Gram series AI PCs, set to debut at CES 2025 in Las Vegas next week. The series includes four variants: Gram Book, Gram Pro, Gram Pro 17-inch, and Gram Pro 2-in-1.

  • The Gram Book features a 15.6-inch full HD display, Intel Core i5 processor, and up to 1TB SSD storage.
  • The Gram Pro sports a 16-inch WQXGA LCD display with peak brightness of 400nits, Intel Core Ultra processors, and up to 2TB Gen4 NVMe storage.
  • The Gram Pro 17-inch model features the same display and connectivity ports as the smaller model, with four 3.0W stereo speakers and Intel Core Ultra processors.
  • The Gram Pro 2-in-1 is available in two 16-inch screen variants, with Intel Core Ultra processors and up to 2TB Gen4 NVMe storage.

The new laptops will be showcased at CES 2025 and will hit global markets, including India, later in the year.

item.title: Apple’s latest iPhone could copy from Samsung for a change - SamMobile - Samsung news
item.description:
Apple’s iPhone could copy from Samsung for a change

Published on: January 1st, 2025 at 13:15 UTC+01:00 Source: Sammobile

Apple fans have long accused Samsung of copying their favorite brand, but now it seems the tables are turning. Rumors suggest that Apple is developing an affordable iPhone, the iPhone 16E, inspired by Samsung's FE series.

Key Points

  1. The iPhone 16E is rumored to have specs more suitable for its price range but may also feature the Action Button, currently limited to Apple's flagship iPhones.
  2. Samsung's FE series has seen success with devices like the Galaxy S23 FE, Galaxy Buds FE, and Galaxy Tab S9 FE and S9+ FE.
  3. Apple's iPhone SE lineup has laid the groundwork for catering to a more price-conscious segment.

“That's the formula that Samsung has perfected with its FE series... It's now realizing that growth is slowing down in the premium segment, so more value must be derived elsewhere through providing the right mix of functionality and affordability.”

Sammobile

Conclusion

Apple's rumored move to introduce an affordable iPhone inspired by Samsung's FE series suggests a shift in strategy to cater to a broader range of customers.

item.title: After Ingenuity's success, Nasa introduces a new 'Mars Chopper' design - Business Standard
item.description:
NASA Unveils New 'Mars Chopper' Design Following Ingenuity's Success

Publication Date: October 2023 Source: NASA News

Nasa has introduced a new helicopter design, the Mars Chopper, which is set to enhance Mars exploration after the success of its predecessor, Ingenuity.

  • The Mars Chopper is larger and equipped with six rotors, each with six smaller blades to increase lift.
  • It has a payload capacity of 5 kg, enabling it to carry scientific instruments for detailed terrain analysis.
  • The helicopter demonstrates capabilities to reach distances of up to three kilometers.
  • It aims to assist in exploring areas that are inaccessible to rovers.
  • Ingenuity performed 72 flights over three years, far exceeding its initial mission requirements.
“Scientists could use Chopper to study large swaths of terrain in detail, quickly – including areas where rovers cannot safely travel.” - NASA

The Mars Chopper's advanced design is expected to significantly contribute to future missions, providing vital aerial data for both robotic and potential human explorations.

item.title: Anant Ambani wears expensive ice-cube like watch that has only 3 pieces in world, it is worth Rs... - India.com
item.description:
Anant Ambani's Rare Ice-Cube Like Watch Worth Rs 22 Crore

Publication Date: January 1, 2025 Source: India.com

Mukesh Ambani and Nita Ambani’s youngest son, Anant Ambani, is known for his luxury watch collection. A recent sighting revealed that he was wearing a limited edition Richard Mille RM 52-04 "Skull" Blue Sapphire watch, of which only three pieces exist.

What is the Cost of Anant Ambani’s Watch?

The watch is valued at approximately Rs 22 crore and is a rare sight for collectors.

Key Points:

  • Anant Ambani’s recent appearance featured a highly sought-after watch.
  • Only three Richard Mille RM 52-04 Skull watches are in existence.
  • The watch showcases intricate craftsmanship, including ruby components and a tourbillon.
The watch is reportedly priced at around Rs 22 crore!

With a rich collection from luxury brands like Richard Mille and Patek Philippe, Anant Ambani exemplifies sophistication in horology.

item.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 series: One UI 7 may feature Gemini Live on lock screen - Business Standard
item.description:
Samsung Galaxy S25 series: One UI 7 may feature Gemini Live on lock screen

Published on: Jan 01 2025 | Source: Business Standard

Samsung is reportedly planning a deeper integration of Google Gemini AI on its Galaxy smartphones with the new Android 15-based One UI 7 user interface. The new interface will utilize a feature called the Now Bar on the lock screen.

  • The Now Bar will work like a lock screen widget with quick access to personalized actions and frequently used apps.
  • Gemini Live will offer a human-like conversational experience with the AI assistant, featuring phone-call-style controls on the lock screen.
  • New Gemini Extensions for native Galaxy apps will allow the AI assistant to perform functions within apps like Samsung Calendar and Samsung Notes.
  • Users may have the option to switch from the native Bixby assistant to Google Gemini.
  • Samsung might provide additional Gemini Advanced subscriptions with purchases of Galaxy S25 series smartphones.
“The base Galaxy S25 could get three months of Gemini Advanced subscription for no additional cost.”

This integration aims to enhance user experience by providing more functionality and ease of use via AI-powered tools on Samsung devices.

item.title: Anant Ambani’s ₹22 Crore Ice Cube Watch: A 1-In-3 Exclusive That Will Leave You Stunned! - Oneindia
item.description:
Anant Ambani's ₹22 Crore Ice Cube Watch: A 1-In-3 Exclusive Timepiece

Published: Wednesday, January 1, 2025, 17:09 [IST] - Source: Google Oneindia News

Anant Ambani, the youngest son of India's richest family, has made headlines with his latest luxury timepiece, the Richard Mille RM 52-04 "Skull" Blue Sapphire, valued at a staggering ₹22 crore.

  1. The watch is one of only three pieces ever created, making it ultra-rare.
  2. It features a pirate skull and crossbones design with a sapphire case and transparent sapphire case back.
  3. The watch is worth approximately ₹22.5 crore (USD 2.6 million).
  4. Anant Ambani is a known horology enthusiast with a collection of prestigious timepieces from brands like Richard Mille, Patek Philippe, and Audemars Piguet.

Anant Ambani's acquisition of this exclusive watch further solidifies his status as a prominent luxury watch enthusiast.

item.title: Apple iPhone 17 to feature ProMotion display, high refresh rate for all models - CNBCTV18
item.description:
Apple iPhone 17 to feature ProMotion display, high refresh rate for all models

Publication Date: TBD | Source: CNBC TV18

Apple is rumored to expand its ProMotion display technology to all models of the upcoming iPhone 17, moving away from the traditional 120Hz refresh rate exclusive to Pro models.

  • All iPhone 17 models may feature the high-refresh-rate ProMotion display.
  • LTPO panels could replace LTPS panels used in previous models, allowing for smoother visuals.
  • Rumors suggest an anti-reflective display that may be more scratch-resistant than current models.
  • The expected launch is set for September 2025.
“The LTPO panels would not only support a high refresh rate but also offer always-on display capabilities.”

While the enhancements are exciting, confirmation from Apple is pending as the launch date approaches.

item.title: Next OnePlus Watch to get ECG and more health features: What to expect - Business Standard
item.description:
Upcoming OnePlus Watch: ECG, Temperature Sensor, and More Health Features Inbound

Publication Date & Source: Android Authority

OnePlus is reportedly working on advanced health features for the third-generation OnePlus Watch, according to a recent report by Android Authority. The upcoming smartwatch is expected to introduce Electrocardiogram (ECG), skin temperature measurement, and other features.

  1. ECG and Atrial Fibrillation Detection
  2. Wrist Temperature Measurement
  3. 60-Second Check-up Feature
  4. Potential 'OnePlus Watch 3 Pro' Model
  5. Expected Specs: Qualcomm Snapdragon W5, 2GB RAM, 32GB Storage
According to the report, the new OnePlus OHealth app now mentions 'OnePlus Watch 3' and 'OnePlus Watch 3 Pro' among the list of supported devices.

The company may launch the next-generation smartwatch around the same time as the OnePlus Watch 2, which was released in March 2024.

item.title: Flipkart kicks off 2025 with ‘Big Bachat Days’ sale: Discounts on iPhone 16 series, Pixel 9, Galaxy Z Fold 6 and more | Mint - Mint
item.description:
Flipkart kicks off 2025 with ‘Big Bachat Days’ sale: Discounts on iPhone 16 series, Pixel 9, Galaxy Z Fold 6 and more

Date: January 1, 2025 | Source: Live Mint

Walmart-owned Flipkart has kicked off its 'Big Bachat Days' sale, providing enticing discounts on a variety of smartphones from January 1 to January 5, 2025.

  • Discounts of up to ₹7,000 on Apple’s iPhone 16 series.
  • Google’s Pixel 9 series discounted by up to ₹10,000.
  • Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 6 discounted by ₹12,500.
  • EMI plans of up to 24 months offered for HDFC Bank cardholders.
  • Sale includes offers on various brands like Motorola, Xiaomi, and Vivo.
“The iPhone 16 Pro Max (256GB) is available for ₹137,900, down from ₹144,900.”

In conclusion, Flipkart's 'Big Bachat Days' sale offers significant savings for smartphone buyers looking to upgrade their devices in early 2025.

item.title: This smallcap retail stock has quadrupled this year. Can it keep rising in 2025? | Stock Market News - Mint
item.description:
This Smallcap Retail Stock Quadrupled in 2023: Will It Continue to Rise in 2025?

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Stock Market News

India's retail sector is experiencing significant growth, marked by a projected 50% increase in retail space by 2028 and an industry valuation of over $1 trillion in 2023.

  • Demand for organized retail spaces and value-driven chains is driving the transformation.
  • The retail sector is expected to grow at a CAGR of 10% by 2030.
  • Investors are keenly watching smallcap stocks as they have shown substantial year-to-date returns.
"The industry was valued at over $1 trillion in 2023 and is set to grow at a compound annual growth rate (CAGR) of 10% by 2030."

In conclusion, the smallcap retail stock market shows promise for continued growth, largely due to the robust expansion of the retail sector in India.

item.title: Poco X7 5G series launch date confirmed: Key features and specifications revealed - India TV News
item.description:
Poco X7 5G Series Launch Date Confirmed: Key Features and Specifications Revealed

Publication Date: January 2025 Source: India TV News

The Poco X7 5G series is all set to launch in India on January 9, featuring the Poco X7 5G and Poco X7 Pro 5G models. The devices will be available on Flipkart, showcasing exciting design elements and robust specifications.

  • The Poco X7 5G includes a centrally located squircle-shaped rear camera and may be available in silver and green.
  • The Poco X7 Pro features a pill-shaped camera module and could sport a dual-tone black and green finish.
  • Performance is powered by MediaTek processors: Dimensity 8400-Ultra for the Pro and Dimensity 7300-Ultra for the standard model.
  • The Pro model is expected to have a 50MP primary camera, while the standard version may include a 20MP front camera for selfies.
  • Both phones are expected to have IP68 water and dust resistance ratings.
  • Display specifications include a 6.67-inch AMOLED with 120Hz refresh rate for both models, and battery capacities of 5,110mAh for the X7 and 6,000mAh for the Pro.
"The Poco X7 5G series is expected to make a big splash in the Indian market upon its release."

With a combination of compelling specifications and attractive design, the Poco X7 5G series aims to attract a significant audience upon its launch.

item.title: Poco X7 Pro to undercut Redmi Note 14 Pro Plus pricing, Poco confirms ahead of January 9 launch - The Financial Express
item.description:
Poco X7 Pro to Undercut Redmi Note 14 Pro Plus Pricing Ahead of Launch

Date: January 9, 2024 Source: Financial Express

The upcoming Poco X7 Pro is set to be priced under Rs 30,000, making it cheaper than the Redmi Note 14 Pro Plus. With advanced features and a powerful processor, it aims to capture the high-performance budget segment.

  • Poco X7 Pro to be priced under Rs 30,000.
  • This pricing is consistent with the previous Poco X6 Pro.
  • Powered by MediaTek Dimensity 8400 processor with a 6,550 mAh battery.
  • Will compete with Redmi Note 14 Pro Plus, which starts above Rs 30,000.
Poco claims that the choice of chipset makes the X7 Pro the most powerful phone under the Rs 30K segment.

The X7 Pro showcases Poco's strategy of delivering high-performance devices at competitive prices.
